moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Autotomize
moves.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Metal Burst
moves.description: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.
